# Origin
Maxilla (Frontal process) and infraorbital region @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion
Skin of upper lip, Alar cartilages of nose @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation

[Facial Nerve CN VII]({{< var ref-cn7.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action
Elevates upper lip, Dilates nostril, Raises angle of mouth @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
